Fusion-Hosts' has amazing deals on Virtual Private Servers (VPS). We hosts our VPS on an Intel Core2Quad Q9300. We guarantee Fusion-Hosts will be the last host for you! The Virtual Private Servers are powered by XEN. XEN gives your VPS the feel of a dedicated server! This means you get more power for your buck. We also have a wide selection of Operating Systems to choose from! Come check us out, I guarantee you will not be disappointed!


All VPS are fully managed! For unmanaged VPS, submit a ticket and get a reduced price. Add-ons are at the bottom.

PAY FOR 1 YEAR ON ANY VPS PACKAGE AND GET 30% OFF FOR LIFE!! Offer ends September 1st!
Promo Code: 30%OffVPS

Intel Core2Quad Q9300
Equal Share CPU
MINIMUM 8 GB RAM
Cores: 4
FULL VPS Root Access
FREE Account Migrations
XEN Virtualization
24/7/365 Support
Choice of Operating System
Server Location Dallas
And much more!
